content.text: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips" )
( ing-8 "1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced" )

content.text: 0) Heat peanut oil in a wok or large skillet.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "peanut oil"@8:18 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a wok"@22:27 / TOOL )
		:loc ( tool-0-1 "large skillet"@31:44 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) When oil begins to smoke, quickly stir in 2 cloves minced garlic, ginger root, green onions and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "stir in"@37:44 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "2 cloves minced garlic"@45:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "ginger root"@69:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "green onions"@82:94 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@99:103 / FOOD )
		:when ( cond-1-0 "When oil begins to smoke"@3:27 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir fry until onion becomes translucent, about 2 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until onion becomes translucent"@12:43 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "about 2 minutes"@45:60 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add chicken and stir until opaque, about 3 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "chicken"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "stir"@19:23 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until opaque"@24:36 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "about 3 minutes"@38:53 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add sweet onions, cabbage, bell pepper, peas and 1/2 cup of the broth/water and cover.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "sweet onions"@7:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cabbage"@21:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "bell pepper"@30:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "peas"@43:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "1/2 cup of the broth/water"@52:78 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cover"@83:88 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) In a small bowl, mix the remaining 1/2 cup broth/water, soy sauce, sugar and cornstarch.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "the remaining 1/2 cup broth/water"@24:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "soy sauce"@59:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "sugar"@70:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "cornstarch"@80:90 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Add sauce mixture to wok/skillet and stir until chicken and vegetables are coated with the thickened sauce.
7) Serve immediately, over hot rice if desired.
